jd: Dear Partners,I hope this email finds you well.My name is Ravikanth Naraharisetty, and I am reaching out to share an exciting job opportunity at RohaTech. We are at the forefront of innovation, constantly striving to improve our technology stack and provide exceptional solutions to our Clients Position : Senior Software Engineer - Google Cloud, Spark, Big DataClient: Amex thru InfyNumber of positions: 2Day 1 onsiteLocation : PhoenixC2C rate : $60 per hrJob SummaryDesign, develop, and deploy scalable software solutions using Google Cloud, Apache Spark, and big data tools.Requirements- 10+ years of experience in software development- Strong proficiency in programming languages (Java, Python, Scala, etc.)- Hands-on 5+ years of experience with Google Cloud, Apache Spark, and big data tools- Understanding of data modeling, data warehousing, and ETL processesNice to Have- Experience with machine learning, data science, or analytics- Knowledge of containerization and serverless computing- Certification in Google Cloud or big data technologiesAlos Please ensure to attach the following documents with the screening Details Visa copy DL copy Passport Number Linkedin Url DOB: 93/94 (MAX C2C with Good hold with Interviews Need ready to F2F)In order to screen your consultant, we must have all the details listed below. Kindly ensure all information is Accurate Screening DetailsFull Name:- Phone Number:- Email:- Linkedin:-Current Location:- Open to Relocation:-Passport Number:- Visa Status:-DOB(Including Year):- Total Experience:-US Experience:-Relevant Experience:-Complete Education:-Availability to Join:-H1 Employer DetailsName:Email:Contact : Thank you for your cooperation, and we look forward to receiving the necessary details.Best regards, Ravikanth RohaTech.Reach ME at Below +91-7036012291 WhatsApp Me / Connect me with linkeidn Ravi@rohatech.comhttps://www.linkedin.com/in/raviroha/
